the goat

I have never played the original half life and never considered myself a half life fan, but I recently played and finished Black Mesa for the first time and fell in love with it. With the lore, the world building, Gordon, the scientists, the cosmic horror aspect. I loved it all. So to be honest...I was disappointed playing this game for the first time after playing black mesa. 

The game for its time was a huge step forward in gaming I'm not going to ignore that, facial animation, physics, the voice acting, it was incredible...for 2004. It really, really hasn't aged well. And if you grew up with the game and the franchise than none of this will bother you, but if you're like me and only just getting into it as an adult...honestly I'd recommend watching a playthrough or waiting for a fan remake. The graphics, voice acting, AI, and over all asthetic I think was really limited for what they had at the time and I feel like there is a game I would love somewhere in here, I mean hell look at the beta leaks it looks incredible what we could have gotten, but as the game is right now...I don't think I'm a big fan, gameplay or storywise.

Welcome. Welcome to City 17.
You have chosen, or been chosen, to relocate to one of our finest remaining urban centers. I thought so much of City 17 that I elected to establish my Administration here, in the Citadel so thoughtfully provided by Our Benefactors. I have been proud to call City 17 my home. And so, whether you are here to stay, or passing through on your way to parts unknown, welcome to City 17. It's safer here.

Ураганный геймплей, выверенный с ювелирной точностью, ни на секунду не позволит заскучать. Революционная физика, до уровня которой, не доходят многие AAA новинки. Потрясающая атмосфера, которая позволит окунуться в мир захваченный пришельцами. Отличная для того времени графика и многое другое. Игра потрясающе играется даже сегодня.

Rise and shine, Mister Freeman, rise and … shine. Not that I wish … to imply that you have been sleeping on … the job. No one is more deserving of a rest, and all the effort in the world would have gone to waste until … well … let's just say your hour has come again. The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference … in the world. So, wake up, Mister Freeman. Wake up and … smell the ashes. 10/10

like portal, portal 2, and almost all of valve's other early-age games, the half-life series is a must. half-life 2 is a major upgrade in graphics, story, and gameplay from the first. the episodes afterward are even better. the game feels very open, but still gives you a little bit of a nudge in the right direction so you don't get stuck. the silent protagonist is a common theme throughout valve's games, and as always, it works perfectly in the setting. this dystopian fps is definitely worth a play.

IDK what you are if you didn't play Half Life....

Simply one of the best games ever made and maybe one of if not the best sequel to a game ever made period. with its groundbreaking physics engine and unbroken narrative Half-Life 2 was a groundbreaking achievement for valve and the game industry as a whole. Gordon has awoken from stasis nearly 20 years after the black mesa incident and now must help the resistance fight the aliens known as the combine whom now rule over earth Gordon has to make use of his arsenal of weapons including the trusty crowbar as well as the gravity gun, solving physics puzzles and fighting enemy's. On august 14th we as a community will try and break the peak player record for hl2 which is currently 13,216, to show are love to valve and their games and make a statement for the game industry as a whole.
